body: # ShiftIt *Managing window size and position in OSX* ShiftIt is a small, nimble utility that allows you to quickly organize and full-screen your Mac OSX windows. Simply press **⌃⌥⌘** and the **arrow keys** to quickly send a window to take up the whole half of your monitor. Or press **⌃⌥⌘+F** to maximize it and take up the full screen faster than you can even _think_ about pressing that unreliable green circle. ShiftIt simply makes managing windows fast and easy. Download -------- ### [Download for OSX 10.7 and Up](https://github.com/trisweb/ShiftIt/raw/master/builds/ShiftIt.zip) Unfortunately builds for older versions of OSX are not currently available. ShiftIt is Open Source and easy to build, so you may be able to build your own! [See more at the GitHub Project Page](https://github.com/trisweb/ShiftIt)
